Generalised Linear Models Haziq Jamil 2021-09-04 About This is a book about linear models.

Chapter 1 The linear regression model Consider \(n\) independent observations \(\{y_1,\dots,y_n\}\) of a dependent variable (also called response variable). Collect all of these observations into a vector \[ \mathbf y = \begin{pmatrix} y_1 \\ y_2 \\ \vdots \\ y_n \end{pmatrix} \in \mathbb R^n \]
